summary: A newbie agrees to deliver the wrong merchandise for money. He will learn soon that this trip will change his views about life, forever.
cast: Alexandru Papadopol|Dragos Bucur|Ioana Flora|Luminita Gheorghiu|Razvan Vasilescu|Doru Ana|Constantin Draganescu|Petre Pletosu|Mihai Ionescu|Jana Gorea|Cristian Bardasan|Marius Bardasan|Marius Bunica|Marian Chirvase|Orlando Chirvase|Vasile Ciobabu|Nicu Cirstea|Nicolae Cobalschi|Silviu Corut|Razvan Dinca|Doru Dumitrescu|Serban Georgevici|Nicolae Gheorghita|Adriana Iurascu|Simona Marinica|Ionut Mihailescu|Andrei Mirea|Carmen Mustatea|Mihai Novacescu|Sanda Oprisor|Octavia Puiu|Daniel Tudorica
title: Marfa si banii
